scripts.build:static: cp static/* deploy/ && mv -f deploy/dot-gitignore deploy/.gitignore
scripts.build: npm run build:dirs && npm run build:js && npm run build:static
scripts.deploy:commit: cd deploy; [[ `git status` ]] && git add `find . -maxdepth 1 -type f` && git commit -m 'pushing updates from parent'
scripts.deploy:push: git subtree push --prefix deploy heroku master
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:commit && npm run deploy:push
